divs: Sighting DetailsMy husband and I were driving along Hwy. 215 going east. We had just gotten on 215 at Eastern Ave. and were adjusting the the flow of traffic. I glanced up and saw this brilliantly lite UFO. It was not the shape of anything you have on your page. The diamond was the closest to it. I tried to get another better look at the unusual shape. I zerod in on it for about 2 seconds and was just adjusting my eyes when it blinked out. The UFO looked like it had a million lights in it, and the material it was made out of looked like crystal to me.
trends: There have been 229 other sightings in Las Vegas
There was one other sighting in Las Vegas on or around March 6th 2009
Summary: A brilliantly lite not really diamond shaped but something like it.
